field.name: exclude_redirect_cats
field.label: Allow Joomla category manager to
field.description: All non-selected usergroups will be redirected to FLEXIcontent category manager

field.name: exclude_redirect_articles
field.label: Allow Joomla article manager to
field.description: All non-selected usergroups will be redirected to FLEXIcontent item manager

field.name: excluded_redirect_urls
field.label: Exclude urls from redirection (enter a part) (BACKEND Only)
field.description: if you have trouble with some URLs unwantingly redirecting to FLEXIcontent URLs, you can enter here a sub-string of them, in order to exclude them from redirection. Seperate urls with %% DO NOT add new line characters

field.name: redirect_pdf_format
field.label: Redirect pdf format
field.description: Joomla 2.5 does not support PDF natively, this provides a solution for J1.5 upgraded sites that used it, by redirecting to HTML version

field.name: checkin_on_session_end
field.label: Check-in on user logout / session expiration
field.description: Check-out records (items,categories,etc) will be checked-in on user logout or session expiration

field.name: limit_checkout_hours
field.label: Time-Limit check-outs
field.description: Impose a maximum time for checked-out records. Records exceeding this limit whill be automatically checked-in

field.name: max_checkout_hours
field.label: Max checked out hours
field.description: Maximum allowed time an record (item,category,etc) should be checked out before automatically checking it in

field.default:
NOTE: if you are sending expiration emails, after items have expired,
do not change item state, and do not clear publish down date

field.name: archive_on_publish_down
field.label: Items with expired dates
field.description: Enable this to automatically archive or unpublish items that their publish_down date is reached

field.name: clear_publish_down_date
field.label: Clear publish down date
field.description: When auto-archiving expired items, also clear the publish-down date, this will make the auto-archived items visible in the archived view.
